Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Sensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A Sensor perform a measure of a given a context
    Author:
    Daniele Carta, Cristian C. Spagnuolo
